com.marklogic.junit.spring

Class AbstractSpringTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • com.marklogic.junit.XmlHelper
        • com.marklogic.junit.BaseTestHelper
          • com.marklogic.junit.spring.AbstractSpringTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestHelper, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @TestExecutionListeners(value={LoggingTestExecutionListener.class,org.springframework.test.context.support.DependencyInjectionTestExecutionListener.class})
public abstract class AbstractSpringTest
extends BaseTestHelper
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Base class for tests that utilize Spring's support for JUnit. Extends BaseTestHelper so that all of the convenience methods available within that are available to subclasses.
